SEARCH

Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    org.jboss.elemento.Container
    Replaced by ElementContainerMethods
    org.jboss.elemento.Finder
    Replaced by ElementQueryMethods.
    org.jboss.elemento.HasElement
    This interface is too broad. It is replaced with more specific interfaces:
    • ElementAttributeMethods
    • ElementClassListMethods
    • ElementConsumerMethods
    • ElementContainerMethods
    • ElementEventMethods
    • ElementIdMethods
    • ElementTextMethods
    org.jboss.elemento.HasHTMLElement
    This interface is too broad. It is replaced with more specific interfaces:
    • HTMLElementAttributeMethods
    • HTMLElementDataMethods
    • HTMLElementStyleMethods
    • HTMLElementVisibilityMethods
    org.jboss.elemento.HasInputElement
    Replaced by HTMLInputElementBuilder
    org.jboss.elemento.mathml.HasMathMLElement
    Replaced by MathMLElementStyleMethods
    org.jboss.elemento.svg.HasSVGElement
    Replaced by SVGElementDataMethods and SVGElementStyleMethods.
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.jboss.elemento.ElementsBag
    Should be replaced by using the standard collection API.
    org.jboss.elemento.InputElementBuilder
    Replaced by HTMLInputElementBuilder
    org.jboss.elemento.LazyElement
    Should be replaced by using late initialization in IsElement.element().
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.jboss.elemento.Elements.bag()
    org.jboss.elemento.Elements.buildId(String, String...)
    Replaced bv Id.build(String, String...)
    org.jboss.elemento.Elements.find(Node, By)
    Replaced by Elements.querySelector(Node, By)
    org.jboss.elemento.Elements.find(IsElement<E>, By)
    Replaced by Elements.querySelector(IsElement, By)
    org.jboss.elemento.Elements.findAll(Node, By)
    Replaced by Elements.querySelectorAll(Node, By)
    org.jboss.elemento.Elements.findAll(IsElement<E>, By)
    Replaced by Elements.querySelectorAll(IsElement, By)
    org.jboss.elemento.Elements.uniqueId()
    Replaced bv Id.unique()
    org.jboss.elemento.Elements.uniqueId(String, String...)
    Replaced bv Id.unique(String, String...)
    org.jboss.elemento.EventType.getName()
    Use public field EventType.name instead
